text: Tekh, kotoryye pereselilis' vo imya Allakha, posle togo kak podverglis' pritesneniyam, kotoryye byli terpelivy i kotoryye polagayutsya tol'ko na svoyego Gospoda, My poselim v etom mire nailuchshim obrazom, a voznagrazhdeniye im v budushchey zhizni v budushchem mire - [yeshche] bol'she. O, yesli by znali ob etom [ikh pritesniteli]
